trans-unit.source: Provides information about speech recognition events.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações sobre eventos de reconhecimento de fala.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property obtains the recognition information as a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> propriedade obtém as informações de reconhecimento como um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> objeto.

trans-unit.source: For more information about speech recognition events, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre eventos de reconhecimento de fala, consulte [usando eventos de reconhecimento de fala](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).

trans-unit.source: **RecognitionEventArgs** is the base for the following classes:
trans-unit.target: **RecognitionEventArgs** é a base para as classes a seguir:

trans-unit.source: The following example attaches a handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> events of the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir anexa um manipulador para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> eventos do reconhecedor de fala.

trans-unit.source: The event argument types for the three events all derive from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs>, which is used as the event data parameter in the handler.
trans-unit.target: Os tipos de argumento do evento para todos os três eventos derivam <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs>, que é usada como o parâmetro de dados no manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the recognition result data associated with the speech recognition event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os dados de resultado de reconhecimento associados ao evento de reconhecimento de fala.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result" /> property returns the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult" /> that contains the information about the recognition.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result" /> propriedade retorna o <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult" /> que contém as informações sobre o reconhecimento.
